title: This Microsoft Windows and Office app bundle is an extra 20% off
content:
Macworld

You’re probably already hip-deep in spring cleaning around your house. But it’s wise to consider a serious spring cleaning when it comes to your trusty computer as well.

You can make sure everything from your operating system to your key productivity apps are updated and working in perfect synchronicity with this Ultimate 2019 Microsoft Bundle featuring Microsoft Office, Project, Visio as well as Windows 11 Pro.

Upgrading to Windows 11 Pro offers a slew of enhanced security features, including Bitlocker device encryption and biometric logins, ensuring a robust foundation for all of your computing needs.

In addition to the Windows upgrade, Microsoft Office 2019 provides essential productivity tools like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access. These apps cover virtually all of your most important tasks, from document creation and presentations to spreadsheet management and database organization.

Beyond the familiar Office suite, Project 2019 and Visio 2019 offer a pair of hyper-specialized tools for project management and diagramming, respectively. 

With Project, users can create timelines, utilize templates, submit timesheets, and develop visually engaging schedules and workflows. Meanwhile, Visio simplifies complex data sets into intuitive flowcharts and hierarchy trees, facilitating better understanding and communication of information.
